synonyms.synonym: Protein phosphatase 3 regulatory subunit B alpha isoform 1

protein.specific_function: Regulatory subunit of calcineurin, a calcium-dependent, calmodulin stimulated protein phosphatase. Confers calcium sensitivity

reference.reference_text: Guerini D, Krinks MH, Sikela JM, Hahn WE, Klee CB: Isolation and sequence of a cDNA clone for human calcineurin B, the Ca2+-binding subunit of the Ca2+/calmodulin-stimulated protein phosphatase. DNA. 1989 Nov;8(9):675-82.
